body_html:
Since there may be a workaround that does not involve creating a new op, this question is better asked on Stack Overflow, where the answer may better help other developers. There is also a larger community that answers questions there.

If you ask a question there and find that there is no solution other than to create a new op, please file another issue with a link to the question. Thanks!

body:
Since there may be a workaround that does not involve creating a new op, this question is better asked on [Stack Overflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow), where the answer may better help other developers. There is also a larger community that answers questions there.

If you ask a question there and find that there is no solution other than to create a new op, please file another issue with a link to the question. Thanks!
